num_of_cakes = int(raw_input())

for x in xrange(num_of_cakes):
	cut_1_x1, cut_1_y1, cut_1_x2, cut_1_y2 = map(int, raw_input().split())

	cut_1_area = (cut_1_x2 - cut_1_x1) * (cut_1_y2 - cut_1_y1)

	cut_2_x1, cut_2_y1, cut_2_x2, cut_2_y2 = map(int, raw_input().split())

	cut_2_area = (cut_2_x2 - cut_2_x1) * (cut_2_y2 - cut_2_y1)



	x2 = cut_1_x2 if cut_1_x2 < cut_2_x2 else cut_2_x2
	y2 = cut_1_y2 if cut_1_y2 < cut_2_y2 else cut_2_y2
	x1 = cut_1_x1 if cut_1_x1 > cut_2_x1 else cut_2_x1
	y1 = cut_1_y1 if cut_1_y1 > cut_2_y1 else cut_2_y1

	x_dist = x2 - x1 if x2 > x1 else 0
	y_dist = y2 - y1 if y2 > y1 else 0

	overlap = x_dist * y_dist

	total_area = cut_1_area + cut_2_area - overlap

	print total_area
